en.title: Challenge Discord - Achievement Hunting
en.description: The Discord server is for League of Legends and is dedicated to challenges. We are specifically here to enable players to connect together and to complete challenges. The first 100 active players have reached the top 200 globally in terms of challenge points and this feat was achieved together as a group.

en.title: Tahm-Ken.ch - Optimal Teamwork Compositions
en.description: Find optimal composition for teamwork challenges in League with the open source tool tahm-ken.ch.

en.title: MasteryChart - Mastery progress viewer
en.description: See your mastery displayed as graph. Using the many given filter methods, you can easily see on which champions you have the most points shown as a bubble chart.

en.title: LoLDB - Your Ultimate League Database
en.description: Discover champions, explore skins, track the shop, and stay updated with everything League of Legends.

en.title: EUNE Challenge Hunting Discord
en.description: A Discord server arranging Challenge groups in the EUNE region for team Challenges, like "Globetrotter".

en.title: ARAM Zone - Everything related to ARAM
en.description: Analyze your own performance on ARAM with each champion, check out the ARAM champion Tierlist  and find the best and alternative builds for every champion, including runes, items, skill order and summoner spells.
